org.restlet.ext.osgi

Interface RestletProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DirectoryProvider, FilterProvider, ResourceProvider, RouterProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDirectoryProvider, BaseFilterProvider, BaseResourceProvider, BaseRestletProvider, BaseRouterProvider

    public interface RestletProvider
    This is a common interface for several of the providers. Users are not expected to implement this interface, but instead implement one of the specialized provider interfaces.
    Author:
    Bryan Hunt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Restlet getInboundRoot(Context context) 

    • Method Detail

      • getInboundRoot

        Restlet getInboundRoot(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - the Restlet application context
        Returns:
        the node to be used as the inbound root of the handling chain
